name: portchecker
tagline: A self-hosted tool for testing open network ports
description: Portchecker.io is a self-hosted utility tool for testing open ports on IPs or domains. It offers a minimal UI and HTTP API for verifying if services are reachable.

features.title: Port Scanning
features.description: Test if specific ports are open on IP addresses or domain names

features.title: Multiple Protocols
features.description: Check TCP and UDP ports for various service types

features.title: Batch Checking
features.description: Test multiple ports simultaneously for efficient network diagnostics

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Simple web UI for entering targets and viewing results

features.title: REST API
features.description: Programmatically check ports using HTTP API for automation and monitoring

features.title: Response Time
features.description: Measure connection response times to identify network latency

features.title: Service Detection
features.description: Identify common services running on open ports

features.title: History Tracking
features.description: View previous port check results for comparison and monitoring
